document.discussion_title: Blast, gunfire, rock Philippine jail, leaving 10 dead - Tulsa World: Ap
document.topic_text: Williams Partners announces new agreements as Chesapeake sells Barnett shale assets Posted: 12:00 am Chesapeake announced its decision Wednesday to exit the Barnett shale, which was once the company's crown jewel and one of its first major shale natural gas plays. More Headlines
